message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you an exclusive opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I believe you'll find it's worth every penny. I'm willing to let it go for $1500000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to be within my budget.

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I understand you're on a budget, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my target price. I can offer it to you for $1400000.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit too high on the price. I'm willing to go up to $1250000, but that's as high as I can go. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to be within my budget.

I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob, and I appreciate your flexibility. However, I'm still a bit far from my target price. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my desired price. I can offer it to you for $1350000, which is a significant discount from my initial offer. This is my final compromise.

I understand you're trying to get closer to your target price, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to get as close to my budget as possible. I'm willing to go up to $1200000, but I really think that's the limit. Can we meet in the middle again?

Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I've made significant concessions already. I'm not willing to go any lower than $1300000. I'm starting to think that you're not serious about making a deal, and I need to consider other options. I'm willing to give you one last chance, but I need a commitment from you. I'll meet you at $1200000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. If you're not serious about making a deal, I'll have to consider other options. This is my final offer.

I'm not willing to go any higher than $1100000. I've made a significant effort to compromise, and I think this is the best I can do. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to be within my budget. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to explore other options.
